data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, sample source, source sample ID, and sample use variable obtained from participants with or without Barrett's and esophageal adenocarcinoma and involved in the "Barrett's and Esophageal Adenocarcinoma Genetic Susceptibility Study (BEAGESS)" project.

variable.name: SAMPLE_SOURCE
variable.description: Source repository where samples originate [BEAGESS, Coriell]

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPLE_ID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
